description: [Tonto Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0131) has used the ShowLocalGroupDetails command to identify administrator, user, and guest accounts on a compromised host.(Citation: TrendMicro Tonto Team October 2020)

external_references.description: Daniel Lughi, Jaromir Horejsi. (2020, October 2). Tonto Team - Exploring the TTPs of an advanced threat actor operating a large infrastructure. Retrieved October 17, 2021.
